title: [P2] Remove panic paths from agent context template setup
description: Replace runtime expect() in context template initialization/lookup with graceful fallback to avoid startup panics.

logs.msg: Hardening plan: remove runtime expect() in ContextManager template registration/lookup; log and fall back to base system prompt instead of panicking.

Removed panic paths in src/agent/context.rs: ContextManager::new now logs template registration failures instead of expect-panicking; render_system_prompt now logs and falls back to base prompt if template lookup fails. Validation: cargo test -q 444 pass, cargo clippy -q clean.
